video.title: TED Talks: Life Hack 2: The Next Level
video.synopsis: The experts from TED Talks offer a variety of new "life hacks": practical tips to make daily living more efficient and more effective.

episodes.synopsis: There never seem to be enough hours in the day, so this TED Talk offers tips for balancing work, personal and family life in the time available.
episodes.title: Nigel Marsh: How to Make Work-Life Balance Work

episodes.synopsis: Margaret Heffernan reveals that when it comes to conflict, the answer isn't avoidance but turning disagreement into productive debate.
episodes.title: Margaret Heffernan: Dare to Disagree

episodes.synopsis: Philosopher Ruth Change reveals the inner strength we must have to make key life decisions, and how to enhance it by facing choices the right way.
episodes.title: Ruth Chang: How to Make Hard Choices

episodes.synopsis: Sound expert Julian Treasure offers vocal exercises and tips on personal interaction to ensure that you're heard when you speak.
episodes.title: Julian Treasure: How to Speak So that People Want to Listen

episodes.synopsis: Social psychologist Emily Balcetis reveals how to overcome diet and exercise fatigue by first seeing yourself as a new person.
episodes.title: Emily Balcetis: Why Some People Find Exercise Harder than Others

episodes.synopsis: David Grady offers ingenious tips on surviving the workplace epidemic of ineffective and poorly planned meetings.
episodes.title: David Grady: How to Save the World (Or at Least Yourself) from Bad Meetings

episodes.synopsis: This TED Talk challenges viewers to consider their responses to problems and change from a mindset of defeat to one of possibility.
episodes.title: Carol Dweck: The Power of Believing that You Can Improve

episodes.synopsis: This TED Talk examines new findings in the science of sleep and how crucial a good night's rest is to brain function and overall health.
episodes.title: Jeff Iliff: One More Reason to Get a Good Night’s Sleep

episodes.synopsis: Writer Kare Anderson tells of overcoming crippling shyness to share her talent with the world, and offers tips on doing the same in your own life.
episodes.title: Kare Anderson: Be an Opportunity Maker

episodes.synopsis: Award-winning novelist Isabel Allende, 71, discusses the importance of passionate living regardless of one's age.
episodes.title: Isabel Allende: How to Live Passionately -- No Matter Your Age
